name: Silent Scope 2: Dark Silhouette
overview:
Silent Scope 2: Dark Silhouette (Silent Scope 2: Fatal Judgment in Europe, and Silent Scope 2: Innocent Sweeper in Japan) was produced by Konami in 2000.

Pick up your sniper rifle and get ready to take down the terrorists. Story mode takes you through a day in the life of a sniper, out to stop a deadly threat to the President and the rest of the world. Choose from 2 characters, Jackal and Falcon, each with a different angle to each level of the action. Multiplayer mode is also included on the PS2 version.
